text: Morning star,14:12. Literally, “shining one,” referring to the planet Venus whose rise in the sky promised the soon-coming dawn. In the Septuagint this was translated as “dawn bringer” which in Latin became “Lucifer,” (light bringer) which is the basis for the King James translation.  son of the dawn, how you have fallen from heaven! Destroyer of nations, you have been cut down to the ground!
